actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Department of Health and Human Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Federal Adoption Services Act of 1991 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services. Requires such services to be nondiscriminatory as to race, color, religion, or national origin.

titles.title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services, and for other purposes.
